title: Human
content:
Human Racial Features Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Human Versatility Subraces N/A

Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Human Versatility

Human is a Race in Baldur's Gate 3. Humans have a bonus racial speed. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their own special characteristics.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. A
